content: Have been playing this constantly since August! Purchased x version after running through free levels. No ads! Lots of fun

Awesome game! The different grid types all play very differently and I love how huge the puzzles can be. The ability to flood cells with shading so you don't have to tap each one would be a cool feature. I hope more grid types get added in the future!
an excellent simple-to-learn, difficult-to-master puzzle. the different grids make sure it's never boring
Best game ever

Great game. Has a million randomly generated games of each type/level/hardness, so I estimate I could just play the squares for about 190 years straight before I ran out of puzzles...and that's if I never slept. And that's only for the square type...there's that many of all the other shapes too. But the squares is the only one I really like. My only complaint is lack of statistics. The only stat you get is your score vs. median, and I'm always much slower than median, so it's too depressing.
I love this app and have had it on each of my phones for years. It's fun and relaxing, with *no* distracting flashing icons or ads. I like how much control you have over the helper features.
Perfect! I love how much you can customize it. It was always my favorite puzzle game and I'm so happy that it's existing as an app that is so perfectly designed.
Spent countless enjoyable hours playing this.
Nicely done with 4 different styles.... I love this game, play it regularly. I purchased this game over 6 years ago. However, after latest update it is asking me to purchase it again. What happened?
Great game

This game runs very smoothly, the interface is clean yet stylish. Different patterns and unlimited levels offers huge replayability. However, you cannot revisit previous completed levels which is a draw back of this game

This is the only game that took a permanent home in my phone. I've been playing it for years in the hard setting with small boards, which is perfect for a quick fix. The new diagonals mode isn't aesthetically pleasing, unlike the other modes, but it's much more challenging and varied. Thanks for adding it!
Truly excellent experience. Controls well, lots of fun and variety.
Hands down the best engine for this puzzle. I would love to see the triangular grid which is my favourite though. Any plans of implementing it or any other layouts?
zooming, undo, color loops, three restore flags to use, thousands of levels. my primary fidget game.
Very fascinating game indeed. Hope that paid version will have unlimited Snowflakes puzzles.

Really fun puzzle game and well worth the money for the full version. I've played it almost everyday for a few years now. There are plenty of configuration options for setting it up the way you prefer to play.
I can't get enough. just wish the puzzles were harder and larger. Also, leaderboards or percentiles after completion of puzzles would be cool. I wanna know where I stand!
Great app, but would love a leaderboard function of everyone's times!

The best implementation of the Slitherlink concept I've seen. UI is pretty, and has parity shading and save/restore, which most other versions are missing. Lots of different options, shapes and difficulty levels.
An excellent game and one of my absolute favourites, but why am I being asked to pay again for snowflakes? I've already paid for this app
The Go-To game for me whenever I have a few minutes to spare. 500 levels in Hard/Medium so far.
i would like to have more challenging levels. i can solve any level even in the pro version.
Give us the ability to hide the blue top banner to prevent screen ghosting. Thanks! le: thank you for that. :) now, could you also show us the fastest and the slowest times?

I really enjoy this app. However, I would like to see a randomizer for when I can't decide on what kind of puzzle to do. It would also be nice if we could choose a colour scheme for the lines, because some of them look too similar to me. February 2019 update: Thanks for fixing the crash issue from the previous update so quickly!
I like the new UI, but there are weird bugs like trying to scroll around the puzzle causes the puzzle to zoom out.
replyContent: This has been fixed in version 1.13. Thanks for reporting!

content: IAP in a "premium" app.
This is exactly what I want in a Slitherlink app. I'm thrilled that they've been adding more board styles recently too!

I've been playing with the full version for a long time now. I love the "inside/outside" (parity) marking and the fact that all puzzles may be solved without guessing (I actually had to backtrack in a few ones, probably missed a clue).
Tried several slitherlink apps and this is pretty much the best there is on android. Lots of levels and very easy to use. Keep up with the updates, love the new features.
snowflakes are awesome! I've been playing this game for several years now, still really addictive! :)
Absolutely love this game. If you like logical deductions, you must try this!
Superb support. New "Diagonals" & "Snowflakes" grids make this great game even better!
This is the best implementation of a Nikoli puzzle, anywhere. Good grids and puzzles with a smart set of features to streamline the mundane parts.
Excellent implementation of Slitherlink.  Just about all the features one could wish for.  Worth every penny.
Elegantly implemented beautiful game. I play it every day.

An excellent Slitherlink game with all the electronic features you could ask for and configure. Easy on the eyes and the battery. Infinitely generated levels. An older version would have received 4 stars, but now that offline play is enabled it has become the in-flight puzzle game par excellence and it deserves 5. The team is consistent with adding new features and even game modes. I highly recommend it as a top-notch puzzle game with great support.
Love it. This is the game I spend the most time on.

This is my favourite game on my phone. So very visually pleasing in the clean simplicity, and it's just really enjoyable to play :) Edit Absolutely loving the new grid with the recent update. I've been playing for a lot of years, so for it to continue to be supported to this extent is absolutely incredible! The new strategy required is excellent, thank you so very much! :D
Oh my god I love this game, I have literally been playing it for about 8 years straight. And the new content with the diagonals grid is inspired! Love it :)
Absolutely love the game but could you please remove the latest update of diagonals grid, it's very hard to play now as diagonals are nearly the same as lines already drawn
My go-to timewaster. And fantastic support from devs.
replyContent: Hello Chris. If you mean drawing pale lines under X's, then there is an option for that under "Miscellaneous".

content: Very practical UI. Very addictive.
This is the single best game for Android
Fun... Replayable, good ui, adjustable difficulty, but needs more shapes.üëçüëç
Great time killer.
Simple & fun (if you try to do each 1 sub 3 mins)
Great execution. I've played this for hours and it's always enjoyable.
The latest update made it super frame-y. I don't know why but it isn't nearly as smooth as it was before.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that. There's been no changes to rendering in this update. Can you please contact by email? I'd like to figure this out and help.

content: Excellent game. Best of the family. Kudos for the free version as well.
Only app I have ever spent money on. I beat all the free levels and needed more. Well worth it. I still play almost daily after 4 years.
Just awesome

Finally a new puzzler instead of another Flow ripoff. I love Flow but after 
beating all the levels a dozen times each I was looking for a new puzzle 
game. This game is exactly what I needed. Good logic based mechanics and a 
simple and easy-to-use interface make this one hard to put down. 1800 free 
levels, paying for ad-free makes it infinity. I highly recommend!

My only disappointment is that not enough people have tried this. Many 
terrific puzzles and very well done. Simple fun that will make you think. 
I've enjoyed this for years and I think most people that enjoy puzzles will 
as well. Try it out!
This is the single best mobile game.
Love this app, perfect in so many ways.

I love this game! If you're into your puzzles this is brilliant! A well put 
together, simple concept. Good controls and an actually good zoom in 
function!
It's the greatest game in the history of mobile gaming, maybe ever.

This is honestly one of the best apps I've ever used. It's well-constructed, the controls are really intuitive, the graphics are great, and the game itself is consistently fun. There's enough variety in the different modes (& the option to increase size/difficulty) that I haven't gotten bored of it yet, and I got the free version first and played until I ran out of levels in my favorite ones (lol). This is the first time I've ever spent money on a game/puzzle app and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
Sorry but these things make no sense to me. Uninstalled.

I estimated I've played tens of thousands of games. For no reason other than my own satisfaction, I wish I could see the standard deviation of the completion time for each puzzle, as I'm always significantly under the median time. I'd also like the ability to remove the shading tool entirely, so that tapping closer to the middle of a cell would act like tapping a near side of the cell box - I got used to the old behavior prior to the implementation of the shading tool, and have never liked the new controls as much.

My favorite game on Android device ever. Simple and addictive, elegant and brilliant. My only question is, is there any plan for a iOS version? I surely will buy it again. BTW, I've been playing this game for 5 years, and thanks for all the entertainment you brought me. This game can always make my day. :D
I just got a new phone. It can handle VR and AR and Netflix simultaneously, yet this little game still takes the prize üèÜ for my favourite app. It has never gotten boring.
I love this game.
Excellent implementation of a classic puzzle game with infinite replay value. Extends the game to hex grids and other styles, which adjusts the strategy in interesting ways. Awesome!
I'm a huge fan. Been playing this for years. Have finally found one that's stumped me! - Huge/Hard/Square lever 454... is this solvable???
Nicely implemented
Amazing time-killer and relaxation agent.
I have played daily with this app for years now. Controls are excellent, levels are with the perfect difficulty and I am still addicted to it. Best app I have ever come across.
The best version of this game I've ever played, and probably my most used app. It's just perfect.
Best slitherlink implementation I've ever found, been playing it for years.
This is an astonishingly compelling puzzle game.
Excellent game but would prefer more grid variations
Magnificent puzzle game

The first thing I install on any new device. I'm sure I've put hundreds and hundreds of hours into this game at this point! I do wish that there was an option to choose a color scheme for the lines, as some colors look very similar to me. But that's purely cosmetic!
The best puzzle game. I wish I can have an iOS version so I can play in a bigger screen.  Also can you add more type of grids such as mixed grid, trapezoid, etc. That would be very great!

One of the best games that I ever played. Very good implementation of slitherlink with just the right help given to solve each puzzle. I love the race to finish each puzzle against the clock. My wish is that while solving the puzzle, the timer can be displayed. Also another wish is to allow us to go back and redo the solved puzzle to get a better time. I owe this app a great deal because it helped me get through a bad emotional time. Don't worry, the money paid for this game is well worth it.
Great game but you should be able to save and load game online in case you move to a new phone. I did and now have to start all over.
This is the best game ever. Why no diagonals, like in the amazon underground version?
I guess it could use better menu graphics however.
Always runs in the background, draining the battery without any obvious reason. What a pity, would otherwise be an enjoyable game. Uninstalled.
The game is fun and a little addictive, and the interface does just what it needs to do.

I really love this game. I had the free version and then ran out of levels so I bought the full version and haven't regretted it. Just wondering what the "median" time means - is it actually the median from everyone who has solved that puzzle? I am almost always slower, even when I hardly pause to think. Would be nice if it showed the number of people who had solved it or a few other stats.

I don't know how I never reviewed this game before now. It's been on every Android phone I've had for years and I've spent hundreds, maybe thousands  of hours playing. It's pure logic, and the implementation here is excellent. I would used to have said it is perfect, but I have recently learned of the "shading" or "parity" technique of slitherlink deduction, but this app does not yet provide for that style notation. Fifth star once it does!  EDIT: Can't believe I forgot to update my review. Sorry about that! 5 STARS!!!
Actually hard and addictive puzzles.
Thanks for the great game! One suggestion -- could you please show the percentile instead of average time for a puzzle.
I really enjoy this game, but it's irritating that after upgrading from the free version, my finished games aren't remembered in the pay version.
Paid the 2.99 only to discover that it starts you at level 100 and doesn't let you go back to the first level? Why would you want to skip the first 99 puzzles?!
Very few games have held my attention this long
If you're looking at the full, you probably have already tried the base. Perfect UI design, excellent functional tools A++

Update: on a Moto X v2 it's fine.  Just one question - I've been playing on Hard/Cairo/Huge for a while, swear I have most of the heuristics down... but I rarely come even close to the *Median* claimed times.  Who ARE these people?
replyContent: David, could you drop us a line at info@ejelta.com -- we would like to research and fix that. Thank you!

content: Loved Slitherlink with paper & pencil, can't get enough of this app. Been playing for years, addition of parity shading was icing on the cake. Love love love.
A cracking game and excellent support from the developer.
Excellent puzzle game, great user interface. Extensions to hexagonal and pentagon grids makes for nice variations. I would like an option to show the solution.
So let me get this straight: even though I paid for the Android version, the Amazon version has more content and is free?
Very nice with everything that you stuck into the game. From the helpful tools to the challenging puzzles, this is well worth the money. Well done!

Definitely a fantastic puzzle game worth the money! It works flawlessly, has fun, challenging game modes and a very nice programmer. I play it all the time and don't tire of it. Of possible is give 6 stars.
Good
replyContent:
Hello Ralf. Thanks for taking the time to review!
I can guarantee that all levels are solvable, including Honeycomb/Med/Med #107. There is a way around the adjacent 0-0 there. Good luck!

content: The best game on the market just got better.  And I play a lot of games!  Others hold my interest for awhile, but I always come back to Slitherlink.  Great, responsive dev too!

The different variations of shapes are very interesting to do. You can play at whatever level you like in small, medium or large puzzles. The graphics are clear and easy to read. It would be nice to be able to color "inside" and "outside" sections for greater clarity as you work the puzzle.
If you like sudokus etc, you will love slitherlink!
I don't always keep this game on my smartphone because it's so addictive. A simple implementation of a game that can be surprisingly difficult. Highly recommended for any puzzle-game fan.
I really like the game of Slitherlink, and this app is a great implementation of it.
Some very clever design choices for playability. Like other commentators, I would prefer to be able to download more than 25 games per internet connection.
Great finger tapping logic.
Actually difficult. Perfect. An actual challenge.
Great game, slick app! Motorola Defy, Android 2.1

An excellent implementation.  Bookmark/Reset functionality works very well.  But I think the puzzles are machine generated.  After a while they're all the same, sort of.  The human made puzzles published by nikoli have a different feel, where many of the puzzles have a certain theme, or there is some geometric pattern to discover, etc.  I'd be willing to pay a little extra to get a collection of hand made puzzles.

Awesome puzzle. I like the way it break the traditional style, the squares type. Every different type of grid will have different kinds of way to solve it. It is getting more and more "fun", when you choose the grid size, like huge size. I do also like the record of time(although no all of the puzzle have it) after you finish a puzzle.

Only flaw (-1 star) is it doesn't load that many puzzles per net connection, so if you are not near WiFi you can't play it for long. It's kind of ridiculous it doesn't just download hundreds or even thousands at a time... How big can they be, seeing as each puzzle is just a small grid of base-5 numbers? Compressed you should be able to store thousands in a tiny file. But you only get like 25 at a time. Silly.  Other than that, a GREAT game... One of my favorites.

This game is one of the most challenging puzzlers I've played. Some levels are easy, and some make me stare blankly for minutes at a time before I figure the right solution. Clean, easy to use, and rewarding without being in your face or even insisting on popping up ads. Well worth the money to get the ad-free version.  The world needs more good apps like this.
I rarely rate apps, but this one deserves it. It's just flawless
Great
When I leave Android (not my idea) this will be the one game that I will miss the most.  Please port it over to ios!
one of my first purchased apps, if not the first, and I still play this pretty much every day. At least a hundred games on my phone and almost no other ones get played.
Simply the best puzzle of its type out there.
Best version of this game no doubt
Great version of slither link.
Near perfection!

This is a seriously well-made version of the classic puzzle game. A variety of grids, lots of puzzles and a lovely simplistic interface. My one gripe? I play quite fast using the line and no-line buttons in the bottom corner. Because the buttons are small and my thumb is big I often find I press the wrong button! Any chance of the option to have bigger buttons?
The latest version has sorted the slow drawing issue on my galaxy s2, thanks!
Thoroughly impressed by the speed in which a problem has been rectified. Back to challenging my brain, great job!
Probably my favorite app. Well done!

Come on guys, I love this game and I was always hoping for a full-screen mode without the status bar. New update went the exact opposite way - added some useless top bar, which only takes up space. Please fix :-(
replyContent: Thanks for sharing an opinion! We might make the top bar folding or optional in a future version, but having it is necessary for some modern phones where it is the only way to get to the menu.

content: I love slitherlink, and haven't found any better app than this! Would love to see a hint system, though. That would take this from great to amazing.  The sensitivity fix for Samsung devices is spot on.
Very glad I found this.
I've tried most Slitherink apps and keep coming back to this one time and time again.  Well worth the purchase.

This is the best implementation of Slitherlink on Android, period!  I have spent WAY too much time playing this! heh  I've been playing slitherlink games electronically since my Palm TRG Pro and the T|X. Even found a good variant on the Nintendo DS. This is by far the best version I've played. I love the variety of grid layouts, and endless puzzles doesn't hurt either. ;-)  This is easily the game played the most on my tablet.
Love the variations
Great game, I love the simplicity.

This is simply a very well-done implementation of the slitherlink game. It always saves my progress flawlessly, and the interface is responsive and easy to use. The only reason not to buy the paid version would be because the free version is so good, with 2400 free levels (I think) and very unobtrusive ads. Even if you only play on hard difficulty, that's still 800 free levels and countless hours of fun time-wasting. I'm addicted.
A nice way to use my brain and wind down
Too addictive...
It's the only game that is always installed on every device I've ever owned.  It's perfect.  You can play for 2 mins, or 90 mins, or more. It's tiny, and fast, so it loads quickly.

This is the best slither link implementation on any platform I've seen. The visual cues are helpful, difficulty perfect, unlimited number of levels. Become addicted today!   To the dev: I'd like more/unlimited colors for paths, and that existing paths not change colours when double clicking (x-ing) adjacent paths.
Excellent client now that the double click issue is fixed. Wish there were harder puzzles though. The hard are easy-medium compared to what I am used to.
Tons of variants, excellent logic puzzle game. Warning: may be addictive.

I'd give this app 6 out of five stars if there was an error check feature. Playing on hard/large it would be great to know if you had made any mistakes when you're stuck about half way through. Many ways a feature like this could be included to add extra dimensionality to the already stellar app! Thanks for a great product!
Me likes
Simple and fun
4 grid types, the bookmark feature, multiple game saves, three skins, coloured paths and customizable UI make this application a real jewel.
Every time I have a few minutes to kill (or 10 or 15) this is my go to game.  Very fun, the interface and implementation of the game is perfect.
Easily the one game I've wasted the most hours on!
Never gets old. The best game for my deep and alone moments.
Great game, play it loads
Best bang for your buck compared to other slitherlink apps. Great game whenever you have a few minutes to wile away.
Love the app!
Can't stop playing this! I was a fan of these puzzles in old-fashioned paper and pencil format but this is even more addictive. Well made and challenging.
I love slitherlink. I'd only played the square grid before so it was exciting and challenging to learn the others. Awesome app.
when i have no network it forces me to quit because it can't verify i paid for it (again)?????  ASUS TF300 tablet.  Great game, though!  Cairo grid is greatness!
Really not worth a quid. Randomised puzzles only. Interface is rubbish. Don't buy this
Excellent
Love this game. Played it over 1500 times

Never go to bed without it! Helps me fall asleep reliably cause its not as nerve-racking as other games. I especially like the dark night mode. Take all the time you need to solve the puzzles, and then there'll always be more :-) Though I sometimes think some of them have multiple solutions (could never prove it, though)
Great game!
Excellent interface and features.  Just needs a hint system.
Has stopped recording my progress
thumbs up all around ;)
Easily the cleanest slitherlink variant on the market.  The minimalist display is perfect, especially when you finally gather the courage to go HUGE and need to focus.
A wonderful puzzler! Within its stable confines, you'll find a smart, intuitive UI coupled with a long list of varied, customizable head-scratchers. Highly recommended!
Great puzzle solving game!
Great game, and as someone has mentioned would love a white on black theme to conserve battery on amoled screens.
This was one of the first apps I ever bought , and one of the very few that I still play each week. Excellent interface , and a huge selection of levels.
Awesome
The lite version let me play. When I purchased this version, they wouldnt let me download any new levels
This is my first Android paid app. Perfectly sucks my free time: )
Loads of different game types, seemingly infinite numbers of games and incredibly addictive! The small games are a great way to spend a few spare mins
Great app. Extremely addictive.
Great app, absolutely addictive. Thanx!!!
Love this app, I'm so addicted!
Great app. Love it.
Puzzles with difficulties to suit anyone. Nice and easy to use. Great app. Nice updates.
A superb game but a ridiculously inefficient implementation. Also, pinch-to-zoom doesn't work on my multitouch-capable 2.1 HTC Hero.
Great game! Pretty much the only thing it needs is statistics (how many levels I completed so far on each skill level and board size, and so on...)
Great puzzle, well written app. Bad performance when dragging and clicking.
Fantastic implementation of a great puzzle game.
Awesome game! Spend hours on it. Thanks for the wake lock fix.
LOVE this version of a favorite puzzle. I'd really like to see an optional "hint" feature at the hard level though...that would make this perfect!
Great game, great interface, helpful developer.
Brilliant, addictive, challenging and most of all: fun. :)
Classic (and very addictive) puzzle, professional user interface.
Very good game, makes your brain work.
Great game! Does exactly what it should and will keep you occupied for a long time.
Excellent! Definitely the best Slitherlink/Loopy app on the market. Innovative use of color makes solving larger puzzles more enjoyable.
